channel.title: Xendesktop on Harry John
channel.description: Recent content in Xendesktop on Harry John

item.title: Deploy multiple VMs from template with PowerCLI
item.description: If you frequently need to deploy multiple VMs from a template in large numbers, most often a bunch of Citrix XenApp or XenDesktop servers following an update to the gold image, this PowerCLI script can help automate the process.
